results.text: So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
results.reason: This verse reassures us of God's constant presence and support, countering feelings of loneliness.
results.reflection: Even in solitude, God's presence is a source of strength and comfort.

results.text: Be strong and courageous. Do not be afraid or terrified because of them, for the Lord your God goes with you; he will never leave you nor forsake you.
results.reason: It highlights God's unwavering companionship and encouragement, which can ease loneliness.
results.reflection: God's promise of never leaving us offers profound solace in lonely times.

results.text: Even though I walk through the darkest valley, I will fear no evil, for you are with me; your rod and your staff, they comfort me.
results.reason: This verse illustrates God's guidance and presence through difficult times, alleviating loneliness.
results.reflection: In our darkest moments, God's presence is a comforting light.

results.text: And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.
results.reason: Jesus' assurance of His perpetual presence provides comfort against loneliness.
results.reflection: Christ's eternal presence is the ultimate antidote to loneliness.

results.text: God sets the lonely in families, he leads out the prisoners with singing; but the rebellious live in a sun-scorched land.
results.reason: This verse emphasizes God's provision of community for the lonely.
results.reflection: God's love creates a sense of belonging even when we feel isolated.
